title: Player Unknown's Battle Ground (PUBG)
description: PUBG Mobile is a fast-paced, high-stakes battle royale game where 100 players parachute onto an island to scavenge for weapons and fight to be the last one standing.

title: Garena Free Fire
description: Free Fire is a free-to-play mobile survival shooter, known for its quick 10-minute matches and compact 50-player battlegrounds, optimized for smooth performance on lower-end devices.

title: Ludo King
description: Ludo King is a digital adaptation of the classic Indian board game 'Pachisi'. It's a cross-platform, multi-player race game based on rolling dice.
